Module xorcery.util
Package com.exoreaction.xorcery.process

Interface Process<T>

Type Parameters:
T - type of the result, may be Void
All Known Implementing Classes:
PersistentSubscriberProcess, RequestCertificateProcess
public interface Process<T>
Long-running process that normally involves I/O to other systems. Can perform optional retries with backoff if possible, and can be cancelled through the provided future. If the process generates a result this can be returned using the provided future as well.
